mapper.select: SELECT system_user.id AS userId, system_user.username AS username, system_user.email AS email, system_role.name, system_role.role_code, system_menu.id, system_menu.title, system_menu.mark , system_menu.type , system_menu.icon, system_menu.path, system_menu.parent_id FROM system_user LEFT JOIN system_user_role ON system_user.id = system_user_role.user_id LEFT JOIN system_role ON system_user_role.role_id = system_role.id LEFT JOIN system_role_menu ON system_role.id = system_role_menu.role_id LEFT JOIN system_menu ON system_menu.id = system_role_menu.menu_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
